org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer

Class PageContentRendererPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.renderer.PageContentRendererPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RendererPlugin

    public class PageContentRendererPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements RendererPlugin
    Renderer plug-in for document page view that draws the content objects (outline + fill).
    Author:
    clc
